TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimeValueSerializer extends System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer

summary.span: 将 的实例与 的实例进行来回转换。

span.span: Converts instances of to and from instances of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 类型转换需要附加状态的情况下，使用而不是。 is used rather than for cases where type conversion requires additional state. 不具有的类型的属性 。 is not attributed to a type with . 这是因为 在 mscorlib 中是，而 mscorlib 不能对其自身未定义的特性类进行依赖关系。This is because is in mscorlib, and mscorlib cannot take dependencies on attribute classes that it does not define itself. 相反，的用法 在 xaml 处理器行为中是特殊大小写的 .NET FRAMEWORK Xaml 服务行为。Instead, usage of is special-cased into XAML processor behavior in .NET Framework XAML Services behavior. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ， 为 system.exception 程序集。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 请参阅 [从 WPF 迁移到](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml)System.exception 的类型。See [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回空字符串 。An empty string returns . 当前实现 在内部使用，并且还使用以下 内容： `DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind | DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault | DateTimeStyles.AllowLeadingWhite | DateTimeStyles.AllowTrailingWhite` 。The current implementation uses internally, and also uses the following : `DateTimeStyles.RoundtripKind | DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault | DateTimeStyles.AllowLeadingWhite | DateTimeStyles.AllowTrailingWhite`.

span.span: A string representation of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 此实现不使用。`context` is not used by this implementation. XAML 值处理中找到的日期的字符串表示形式基于 `en-US` 区域性。String representations for dates as found in XAML value processing are based on the `en-US` culture. 这是因为在概念上，用于区分区域性的信息在编译时和运行时阶段之间是拆分的，必须在整个过程中使用已知的字符串表示形式。This is because XAML processing for culture-sensitive information is split conceptually between compile-time and run-time phases and must use a known string representation throughout. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 全球化和本地化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview)。For more information, see [WPF Globalization and Localization Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview). 当前实现使用根据所提供的的方面是否有值而调整的格式字符串 。The current implementation uses a format string that is adjusted depending on whether aspects of the supplied have values. 例如，如果中没有任何值 ，格式字符串将采用格式， `yyyy-MM-dd` 而不是写出时间部分的完整详细级别零值。For example, if there is no value in , the format string is in the form `yyyy-MM-dd` rather than writing out full-verbosity zero values for the time component.

span.span: is not a or is .
